import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, Validators, FormsModule, ReactiveFormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-student-profile', templateUrl: './student-profile.component.html', styleUrl: './student-profile.component.css' }) export class StudentProfileComponent { firstFormGroup = new FormGroup({ firstname: new FormControl('', Validators.required), }); secondFormGroup = this._formBuilder.group({ secondCtrl: ['', Validators.required], }); isLinear = false; constructor(private _formBuilder: FormBuilder) { } }
Personal Details First Name Last Name National ID Mobile Number Member Since
